request.description: Retrieve the details about a custom channel. This API allows you to see a custom channel's current capabilties and other configuration metadata
This endpoint can be used to update a channel's capabilities. You can also use it to update the channel's webhookUri and its channelAccountConnectionRedirectUrl.

query.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.
The maximum number of results to display per page.

request.description: Retrieve a PublicChannelAccount that contains all the metadata about your channel account. This includes information like its channel, associated inbox id, and delivery identifier information.

request.description: This API is used to update the name of the channel account and it's isAuthorized status. Setting to isAuthorized flag to False disables the channel account.

item.name: Update a channel account staging token

request.description: This API is used for integrators creating public apps. Use this API to update a channel account staging token's account name and delivery identifier. This information will be applied to the channel account created from this staging token.
